dyimagefx

Class Mask

  • java.lang.Object
    • dyimagefx.Mask

  • public class Mask
extends java.lang.Object
    File: Mask.java Description: This fill will create mask aka kernel or structuring element.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Mask() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int[] allOne(int maskSize)
      This will return a square mask [maskSize x maskSize] having all the elements set to 1.
      static int[] drawCircle(int diameter)
      This will return a square mask with circumference of the circle set to 1.
      static int[] drawDiamond(int width)
      This will return a square mask having diamond shape set to 1.
      static int[] fillCircle(int diameter)
      This will return a square mask with circle filled with 1.
      static int[] fillDiamond(int width)
      This will return a square mask with filled diamond.
      static int[] fillDiamondCorners(int width)
      This will return a square mask with of diamond shape with corner filled with 1.

    • Method Detail

      • allOne

        public static int[] allOne(int maskSize)
        This will return a square mask [maskSize x maskSize] having all the elements set to 1.
        Parameters:
        maskSize - the size of the 2D array
        Returns:
        2D mask

      • drawCircle

        public static int[] drawCircle(int diameter)
        This will return a square mask with circumference of the circle set to 1.
        Parameters:
        diameter - diameter of the circle. [An odd integer like 9, 11, 13 etc]
        Returns:
        2D mask

      • fillCircle

        public static int[] fillCircle(int diameter)
        This will return a square mask with circle filled with 1.
        Parameters:
        diameter - diameter of the circle. [An odd integer like 9, 11, 13...]
        Returns:
        2D mask

      • drawDiamond

        public static int[] drawDiamond(int width)
        This will return a square mask having diamond shape set to 1.
        Parameters:
        width - The width of the square mask. [An odd integer like 9, 11, 13 etc]
        Returns:
        2D mask

      • fillDiamond

        public static int[] fillDiamond(int width)
        This will return a square mask with filled diamond.
        Parameters:
        width - The width of the square mask. [An odd integer like 9, 11, 13...]
        Returns:
        2D mask

      • fillDiamondCorners

        public static int[] fillDiamondCorners(int width)
        This will return a square mask with of diamond shape with corner filled with 1.
        Parameters:
        width - The width of the square mask. [An odd integer like 9, 11, 13...]
        Returns:
        2D mask
